channel.title: ~~help me please! what port do i open?!?
channel.description: i am going to port forward now.. but i need to know what port i need to open if im gona use no-ip can someone please tell me

but it wont work!
guys try it for me
flames.no-ip.org[/quote]try using your computer ip adress[quote=“xxl3th4lxx, post:9, topic:123276”]ricky, his server might not be using 43594.

[offtopic] Btw your sig with the website. Website address can’t have spaces. LOL[offtopic][/quote]Also look up above and jsut click the mopar extra thingy.
